attributes.action: Abolish Immigration Controls as they are immoral, unjust and illegal
attributes.additional_details:
Racism, Sexism, and Disability discrimination are all illegal in the UK because a person's race, gender or disability have no effect on their life potential.

The Home Office seem to think discrimination on the basis of nationality is legal despite it also having no effect on their life potential.

The geographic location where a person was born or where their parents were born has no impact on their life potential.

This petition calls on the Home Office to abolish all immigration controls and ban discrimination on the basis of nationality.
